name: Manix's Attack
description:
I did this with marching band and high school active, plus it is my first published/finished game so I'm pretty proud of it.

You have gotten stuck in the game because of Manix.

Fight off the evil Manix on the fifth level to win.

There are two endings.

The good ending might help you figure out the game and the lies that exist in this description. Enjoy!

Made for the 2019 Community Game Jam

Look for the ending dialogue here... I ran out of time...

- - Please actually achieve the endings before you read these - -

Bad:

You blast Manix to bits!

The screen goes black, green text appears saying:

Good job pet, you killed him

You were the executioner.

Good:

You take the five gleaming keys and unlock the door...

Here it is, the AI that trapped Manix

One he was able to grant you the final key, you left and entered the room he talked about.

You destroy the code and return Manix to his original body.

- - Note - -

I didn't remember to change the one variable that would let this happen, but after the good ending was achieved, the title screen would play the same tune it normally plays, except in C major instead of C minor. The title would have changed to "The Game is a Liar".
